metadata.title: Is it possible to change the screen display orientation by using emWin at runtime rather than during compilation?

sections.content:
Question:
Is it possible to change the screen display orientation by using emWin at runtime rather than during compilation?
Answer:
Yes. Is possible.
Set EMWIN_USE_RUNTIME_ORIENTATION in the configuration option (r_emwin_rx_config.h) to "(1)".
As a result, you can use AppWizard's ROTATEDISPLAY function and screen rotation using the LCD_ROTATE_SetSel().
Note that the user does not need to call or set initialization functions such as LCD_ROTATE_AddDriver() and LCD_ROTATE_SetCallback().
Please refer to the following manual for details.
emWin User Guide & Reference Manual (Chapter 11 Display drivers, 11.5 Display orientation)
AppWizard User Guide & Reference Manual (8.3.15 ROTATEDISPLAY)
emWin FIT module manual (2.6 Configuration while Compiling, 6.1.5 Notes on touch coordinates when the orientation change function is used at runtime)
Suitable Products
RX Family
